text: hananim-eun midneun jadeul-i cheohago issneun sangtaelo beolyeoduji aniha simyeo saag-eulobuteo gubyeolhago gilbo lo indohasa boiji anihan yeong-gye neun balghiji anh-eusinila geuleona ha nanim-eun geubun-ui tteus-e ttalo seonjija deul-eul seontaeghasyeoss-euni hananimgwa seonjijadeul-eul mid-eula midneundamyeon gong-gyeonghalageulihamyeon neohuiege keunakeun bosang-iiss-eul geos-ila
